name: Increase by a factor of 10 all numbers divisible by three
instruction:
Numbers divisible by three are numbers that are divided by 3 without a remainder.

To check, you can use the operator `%` (the remainder of division) and if it is zero, then the number is a multiple of three.

Write a function `multiplyByTen` that takes a number and returns it multiplied by a factor of 10 if it is a multiple of three.

Otherwise, return the number unchanged.

Run examples:
```javascript.
multiplyByTen(3); // 30
multiplyByTen(10); // 10
multiplyByTen(0); // 0
multiplyByTen(-3); // -30
multiplyByTen(-10); // -10
multiplyByTen(-15); // -150
```

Use the `===` (strict equality) operator to compare with zero.
```javascript
const num = 0;
console.log(num === 0); // true
```
